column5: Almost as good as the double twist 720 the Coyote goalie pulled lastnight, lol!
It did look like he was hit in the mellon by a snipers shot didn't it?
All that rolling around holding his face lead to............nothing.   Should have gotten 2 for delay of game.
Smith must have played soccer as a kid. No doubt he was hit, and there should have been a penalty, but the embellishment was ridiculous and embarrassing.
Well, at least they offered some sort of excuse. The Leafs offer no excuses for falling all over themselves!

Dam mit I missed all that... Too tired to stay up. I was around for the last three seconds o the third. Just enough to go to bed angry. Smith looked pissed after that goal too. Was the "head" shot before or after the end of the third?
Middle of the 2nd? I went to bed after the 2nd period.
It was just like watchin' ole Billy Smith writhing around on the ice! http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billy_Smith_(ice_hockey)
